segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there polishing her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's all over the floor now, and she's in it up to her ankle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, stretching way too high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s tilting back; he’s going to crash any minute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s just waiting there, hand out like she deserves a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn’t the mom turning around to see this mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, water damage starting on the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it’s chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears if someone slips or falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids stealing cookies, what a headache for parents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t heard the water splashing.
segments.speaker: PAR
